stanza.line: Let me confess that we two must betwain
Although our undivided loves are one
So shall those blots that do with meremain
Without thy help by me be borne alone
In our two loves there is but onerespect
Though in our lives a separablespite
Which though it alter not love soleeffect
Yet doth it steal sweet hours from lovedelight
Lest my bewailed guilt should do theeshame
Nor thou with public kindness honourme
Unless thou take that honour from thyname
But do not so I love thee in suchsort
As thou being mine mine is thy goodreport
